languages.text: "Как же они громко думают". {n}Побледнев, Идира касается {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмента{/g} на виске. Ей явно неуютно под взглядами огромной толпы. Простолюдины, впервые видящие настоящую "колдунью", сверлят ее любопытными и боязливыми взглядами.{/n}

"Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on her temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как же они громко думают". {n}Побледнев, Идира касается {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугмента{/g} на виске. Ей явно неуютно под взглядами огромной толпы. Простолюдины, впервые видящие настоящую "колдунью", сверлят ее любопытными и боязливыми взглядами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on he temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

"Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on he temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

"Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on he temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

languages.text: 「ずいぶんと騒がしい思考の持ち主ね、ここの人たちは」{n}イディラは退屈そうな表情で自分の身体に埋め込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}をコツコツと叩く。眼下の大群衆に戸惑っているのは明らかだ。本物の『ソーサラー』を初めて見る一般市民は、イディラを好奇と恐怖の目でじっと見つめる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on her temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ずいぶんと騒がしい思考の持ち主ね、ここの人たちは」{n}イディラは退屈そうな表情で自分の身体に埋め込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}オーグメティック{/g}をコツコツと叩く。眼下の大群衆に戸惑っているのは明らかだ。本物の『ソーサラー』を初めて見る一般市民は、イディラを好奇と恐怖の目でじっと見つめる。{/n}

languages.text: “这些人的思想太吵闹了。”{n}伊迪拉脸色惨白，敲了敲太阳穴上的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。很显然，她并不适应站在这么一大群人面前。那些从来没有亲眼见过“巫师”的平民百姓，此刻正满怀好奇与恐惧，打量着她。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on her temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这些人的思想太吵闹了。”{n}伊迪拉脸色惨白，敲了敲太阳穴上的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}。很显然，她并不适应站在这么一大群人面前。那些从来没有亲眼见过“巫师”的平民百姓，此刻正满怀好奇与恐惧，打量着她。{/n}

languages.text: «Esta gente piensa muy fuerte». {n}Con rostro pálido, Idira se toca el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético{/g} de la sien. Está claro que las miradas de la muchedumbre le incomodan. La plebe nunca ha visto a una «hechicera» de verdad antes y la mira con curiosidad y miedo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on her temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Esta gente piensa muy fuerte». {n}Con rostro pálido, Idira se toca el {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumético{/g} de la sien. Está claro que las miradas de la muchedumbre le incomodan. La plebe nunca ha visto a una «hechicera» de verdad antes y la mira con curiosidad y miedo.{/n}

languages.text: « Quelle cacophonie de pensées, » {n}commente Idira, livide, en tapotant l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique{/g} sur sa tempe. La majorité des spectateurs n'ayant jamais vu de vraie « sorcière », beaucoup ne peuvent s'empêcher de la dévisager avec une peur mêlée de curiosité, et la jeune femme semble déconcertée par cet excès d'attention.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on her temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Quelle cacophonie de pensées, » {n}commente Idira, livide, en tapotant l'{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmétique{/g} sur sa tempe. La majorité des spectateurs n'ayant jamais vu de vraie « sorcière », beaucoup ne peuvent s'empêcher de la dévisager avec une peur mêlée de curiosité, et la jeune femme semble déconcertée par cet excès d'attention.{/n}

languages.text: "Diese Leute denken sehr laut." {n}Mit blasser Miene tippt Idira auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmetik{/g} an ihrer Schläfe. Der Blick der gewaltigen Menge ist ihr offensichtlich unangenehm. Die normalen Bürger haben noch nie eine echte "Hexe" gesehen und starren sie neugierig und verängstigt an.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on her temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Diese Leute denken sehr laut." {n}Mit blasser Miene tippt Idira auf die {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Augmetik{/g} an ihrer Schläfe. Der Blick der gewaltigen Menge ist ihr offensichtlich unangenehm. Die normalen Bürger haben noch nie eine echte "Hexe" gesehen und starren sie neugierig und verängstigt an.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu insanlar çok gürültülü düşünüyor." {n}İdira'nın şakağındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetik{/g}, oraya götürdüğü elinin hedefi oluyor. Kalabalığın bakışlarından rahatsız olduğu belli. Halk daha önce hiç gerçek bir "sahir" görmediğinden hâliyle kendisine merak ve korkuyla bakıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Very loud thinkers, these people." {n}Her face pallid, Idira taps the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmetic{/g} on her temple. She is clearly discomfited under the gaze of the massive crowd. The commoners have never seen a real "sorcerer" before, and they stare at her with curiosity and fear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu insanlar çok gürültücü düşünüyor." {n}Yüzü solgun İdira, şakağındaki {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogmetiğe{/g} dokunuyor. Kalabalığın bakışlarından rahatsız oldu belli ki. Halk daha önce hiç gerçek bir "sahir" görmedi, hâliyle kendisine merak ve korkuyla bakıyorlar.{/n}
